content: Hi All! I am a current research student. I've been using Rust for a few years now and have contributed to some crates but haven't contributed to Rust itself until recently. I am looking forward to contribute more to the Rust compiler/library in the future!
Hi @Gary Guo! You may want to read the rustc dev guide. If you need any help you may want to ask at #t-compiler/help. There is the E-easy label for easy issues. Good luck!
